title: Delivering good lightning talks
summary: This is some teaser blurb describing the article in short-form to tease readers into clicking on it. I like the unbroken nature of the lines.
contents:
1 Year Placement – Junior Engineer

Overview (responsibilities):

Cycled roles in front-end, back-end and QA. Gained proficiency working in an agile environment to deadlines. Contributed to project management by acting as SCRUM master and inter-departmental liaison with stakeholders.
